name: Swig Sour Cream frosting
steps: Start by creaming together butter and sour cream and salt. Slowly add powdered sugar. When it gets so thick its not a frosting like add a splash of milk. Alternate this process until your frosting is the desired consistency.
Add 1 drop of red food coloring and whip on high 1 minute.
The magic of Swig sugar cookie is that the cookies are kept cold and the frosting is room temperature. Frost right before serving. Warm up frosting before serving.
